definition: bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
bird's nest/nickname for Beijing 2008 Olympic stadium
lit. birdsong and fragrant flowers (idiom); fig. the intoxication of a beautiful spring day
to get a bird's-eye view/bird's-eye view/broad overview
lit. like a little bird relying on people (idiom)/fig. cute and helpless-looking
lit. a bird startled by the mere twang of a bow (idiom)/fig. sb who frightens easily, due to past experiences

sentences.english: Happy is a bird, it found only in fulfillment of the tree.
sentences.chinese: 快乐的是一只鸟，它只栖息在花繁叶茂的树上。

sentences.english: All you have to do to win is unscramble the words here to find four names of birds.
sentences.chinese: 只要你能从这些单词中找到四种鸟的名称你就赢了。

sentences.english: The bird flew up from the grass.
Its emblem changed from the bird to the snake, and then tot…
sentences.chinese: 巴人之族徽由鸟而蛇而虎，最终以白虎为图腾。

sentences.english: This is a Desert Wheatear for me, a fresh female.
sentences.chinese: 我认为这是一只刚换羽的漠即鸟母鸟。

sentences.english: If you were a bird, how big could you be?
sentences.chinese: 如果你是一只鸟，你能长到多大呢？

sentences.english: Rich in fish, its waters attract thousands of cormorants .
sentences.chinese: 湖中丰富的鱼资源吸引了成千上万的鱼鸟。

sentences.english: When the owl sings,the nightingale will hold her peace.
Set the bird's wings with gold and it will never again soar in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 把黄金系在鸟翅上，鸟儿将永远不能翱翔于天际。

sentences.english: Other people like fish, caged birds, tortoises and even snakes, monkeys or lions.
sentences.chinese: 另一些喜欢鱼，鸟，龟甚至蛇，猴和狮子。

sentences.english: The bird is flying low above the water.
The bird had to be extricated from the netting.
sentences.chinese: 男孩从网中救出那只鸟。

sentences.english: Rearing by imprinted birds with a certain amount of human contact.
sentences.chinese: 通过保持一定量的人为接触去饲养带铭印的鸟。

sentences.english: The gunshot started three birds at one time.
sentences.chinese: 枪声一下子把三只鸟给惊飞了。

sentences.english: This amazing bionic bird can take-off, fly, and land autonomously.
sentences.chinese: 这种智能鸟可以自动起飞，飞行以及降落。

definition: (bird species of China) little egret (Egretta garzetta)
